attributes.action: Teach children Yoga in school - a proven coping mechanism for stress & anxiety
attributes.additional_details:
Invest in the prevention of children's mental health issues by:

a)      revising school curriculums to include 10 minutes of Yoga practice in the classroom daily
b)      training educators in simple yoga techniques and exercises that can be practised in the classroom
c)       investing in yoga and meditation workshops for schools

Please sign our petition today and help us turn the tide on anxiety, depression and mental health issues, now the largest epidemic facing young people today.
attributes.background:
Invest in the long-term prevention of mental health issues by teaching young people basic Yoga techniques in school.

10 minutes of Yoga a day is proven to help young people better cope with stress, anxiety, improve self-esteem, behaviour, concentration, social interaction, fitness & health.
